body.script: /* Must be below squarespace-headers */(function(){var e='ontouchstart'in window||navigator.msMaxTouchPoints;var t=document.documentElement;if(!e&&t){t.className=t.className.replace(/touch-styles/,'')}})()

img.alt: Pic for Banner- Website Interest Form.JPG

div.h2: Located in East Tulsa, College Bound Academy is a tuition-free, college preparatory K-4 charter school that openED with kindergarten students in August 2015.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Through rigorous academics, character development, and a joyful, achievement-oriented school culture, College Bound Academy Charter School equips every K-4 scholar with the freedom to succeed in middle school and high school, graduate from college, and access the professional career of their choice.
